Dieter Rams

My name is Miguel Angel Cardona, Jr. I am a designer, illustrator, photographer, and creative developer. Currently the Lead Designer at imgix in San Francisco, CA. I was previously a Visting Professor at the RIT School for Design and a co–founder of Dumbwaiter Design in Rochester, NY.

I spend most of my time wandering the Bay Area with a cache of markers and a sketchbook in pursuit of inspiration. I can usually be found drawing on paper coffee cups in one of my neighborhood cafes.

Feel free to drop me a Drop me a line.
